title: Rule-Based Online Training Program for Enhancing Argumentative Coherence

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Program targeting logical fallacy identification and fair argumentation structure development in science education. Self-directed learning via LMS in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Six major types of rule violations in scientific argumentation can be identified with 80% accuracy
At least three appropriate response strategies to unfair argumentation tactics can be presented
An evaluation report applying argumentative integrity standards to real scientific discussion cases can be written
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
